meta.description:
Welcome to the challenge of optimizing the network of a futuristic transportation system that interconnects 7 strategic hubs across a thriving metropolis. These hubs, ranging from the central dispatch center to the main distribution hub, are connected by a network of high-speed transit lanes, each with a distinct capacity limitation for vehicles per hour. 

Here's a breakdown of the transit system's capabilities, indicating the maximum number of vehicles that can move from one hub to another within an hour:

- From Hub 0 (Central Dispatch): Vehicles can move to Hub 1 (15 vehicles), Hub 2 (2 vehicles), Hub 3 (16 vehicles), Hub 4 (3 vehicles), Hub 5 (5 vehicles), and Hub 6 (3 vehicles).
- From Hub 1: Vehicles can move to Hub 0 (7 vehicles), Hub 4 (19 vehicles), Hub 5 (15 vehicles), and Hub 6 (16 vehicles).
- From Hub 2: Vehicles can move to Hub 0 (11 vehicles), Hub 1 (14 vehicles), Hub 3 (14 vehicles), Hub 4 (8 vehicles), Hub 5 (11 vehicles), and Hub 6 (6 vehicles).
- From Hub 3: Vehicles can move to Hub 0 (17 vehicles), Hub 1 (11 vehicles), Hub 2 (11 vehicles), Hub 4 (11 vehicles), Hub 5 (16 vehicles), and Hub 6 (19 vehicles).
- From Hub 4: Vehicles can move to Hub 0 (10 vehicles), Hub 1 (4 vehicles), Hub 2 (17 vehicles), Hub 3 (20 vehicles), Hub 5 (12 vehicles), and Hub 6 (17 vehicles).
- From Hub 5: Vehicles can move to Hub 0 (3 vehicles), Hub 2 (4 vehicles), Hub 3 (5 vehicles), Hub 4 (20 vehicles), and Hub 6 (4 vehicles).
- From Hub 6 (Main Distribution Hub): Vehicles can move back to Hub 0 (15 vehicles), Hub 1 (2 vehicles), Hub 2 (15 vehicles), Hub 3 (18 vehicles), Hub 4 (17 vehicles), and Hub 5 (7 vehicles).

In this advanced transit network, a capacity of "0" indicates that there is no direct transit lane connecting two specific hubs.

The objective is to determine the maximum capacity of vehicles that can be dispatched from Hub 0 (the Central Dispatch Center) to Hub 6 (the Main Distribution Hub) per hour, while ensuring that the flow through each transit lane does not exceed its specified capacity limit. 

What is the maximum number of vehicles that can be optimally dispatched from the Central Dispatch Center to the Main Distribution Hub within an hour?

sets.name: H
sets.description: Set of hubs in the transportation network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of vehicles per hour between hubs.

objective.name: max_flow
objective.description: Maximize the flow from Hub 0 to Hub 6.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 1.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 2.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 3.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 4.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 5.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_6
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 6.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['1'] for j in H if j != '1') + quicksum(flow[i]['1'] for i in H if i != '1')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['1'][j] for j in H if j != '1') + quicksum(flow[i]['1'] for i in H if i != '1')

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['2'] for j in H if j != '2') + quicksum(flow[i]['2'] for i in H if i != '2')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['2'][j] for j in H if j != '2') + quicksum(flow[i]['2'] for i in H if i != '2')

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['3'] for j in H if j != '3') + quicksum(flow[i]['3'] for i in H if i != '3')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['3'][j] for j in H if j != '3') + quicksum(flow[i]['3'] for i in H if i != '3')

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['4'] for j in H if j != '4') + quicksum(flow[i]['4'] for i in H if i != '4')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['4'][j] for j in H if j != '4') + quicksum(flow[i]['4'] for i in H if i != '4')

constraints.name: flow_conservation_5
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['5'] for j in H if j != '5') + quicksum(flow[i]['5'] for i in H if i != '5')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['5'][j] for j in H if j != '5') + quicksum(flow[i]['5'] for i in H if i != '5')

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['6'] for j in H if j != '6') + quicksum(flow[i]['6'] for i in H if i != '6')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow['6'][j] for j in H if j != '6') + quicksum(flow[i]['6'] for i in H if i != '6')
